I am an Economist in the Economics and Market Research Department at the [International Finance Corporation](https://www.ifc.org/) and a Research Affiliate of the [CESifo Network](https://www.cesifo.org/en). I received my Ph.D. in Economics from [University of California, Berkeley](https://www.econ.berkeley.edu/) in May 2021. I can be reached at [piyushp\@berkeley.edu](mailto:piyushp@berkeley.edu) or [ppanigrahi\@worldbank.org](mailto:ppanigrahi@worldbank.org).
